name: After the Battle, Rimuru
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and return it to his or her hand.
flavor_text: I guess it's over.

name: Successor, Rimuru
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "Inherited Wishes, Rimuru", look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if "Meguru Mono" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

【ACT】 Memory [(1) 【REST】 1 of your characters] If ""Conqueror of Flames" Shizu" is in your memory, choose up to 1 "Successor, Rimuru" or ""Predator" Rimuru" in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and put all markers underneath this card face down in any order underneath that character as markers.
flavor_text: Rest in peace, Geld.

name: Achieving Vindication, Shion
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavor_text: Right! On it!

name: Cutting Down in One Blow, Hakurou
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500.
flavor_text: Of Great Rimuru's many glorious victories in war...

name: Feeling of Respect, Eren
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavor_text: W-Wow...

name: "Caretaker of the Great Forest" Treyni
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavor_text: I would like you to defeat the Orc Lord.

name: "Samurai" Shion
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: I am a Samurai, bodyguard to Great Rimuru. I'm also his secretary!

name: Mighty Warrior, Shion
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Overwhelming Blow" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: This will be the first, you see!

name: Shared Journey, Rimuru
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character on your opponent's back stage with level higher than your opponent's level. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase.

name: Mysterious Demon, Cromwell
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the total number of trigger icons among the cards revealed by this effect. (Damage may be canceled)

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Death March Dance" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, return it to his or her hand, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 character with "Orc(豚頭)" in its card name that is not 【REVERSE】 from your stage into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of markers underneath this card is 4 or more, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, put it face down underneath this card as a marker, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 [(1) Put 4 markers underneath this card into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] If your level is 2 or higher, choose up to 1 ""Orc Disaster" Geld" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

【ACT】 [Put 1 of your other "Cunning Majin, Gelmud" on your stage face down underneath this card as a marker] 【STAND】 this card, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Summoning Tempest Wolves! Gobta
expansion: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your card, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return the card to its original position)

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that card gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: All right! I'll show you how it's done!
